name: Dev-Pro
description:
Dev-Pro Company was founded by a successful entrepreneur and US citizen, Jeff Bianco, in September 2011. Our success contributes to more than 20 years of experience as president of the company in the customer market outsource software development in Ukraine.
Dev-Pro provides a wide range of IT services, including development and maintenance of software for different platforms, consulting and professional IT services, office support and client server infrastructure, preparation for certification PCI, SOX and pr.
